snippet: Senator Rand Paul, in an attempt to reignite his presidential campaign, released a video in which he set the United States tax code on fire to show how serious he is about overhauling it.
abstract: Senator Rand Paul, in an attempt to reignite his presidential campaign, released a video in which he set the United States tax code on fire to show how serious he is about overhauling it.

headline.main: Rand Paul Takes a Match to the Tax Code. And a Wood Chipper. And a Chainsaw.
